reference_components: TRAITS - trait definitions with rarityWeight and conflicts
BADGES - badge definitions with position tags

1_executive_summary.description: Fix critical issues in player-generator.ts identified by multi-AI review (ChatGPT, Gemini, DeepSeek, Le Chat, Grok). Primary fix: attribute tier system calculates points but never uses them, making archetypes feel same-y. Secondary fixes: empty array guards, position-aware traits, badge split implementation.
1_executive_summary.goal: Make archetypes meaningfully affect player attributes so a 'Power Rusher DE' and 'Speed Rusher DE' have distinct stat profiles
1_executive_summary.scope: Refactor generateAttributes(), add safety guards, align trait/badge logic with comments

risks.risk: Changing attribute generation affects all existing players
risks.mitigation: Changes only affect newly generated players, not stored data

risks.risk: Tier boost math could produce out-of-range values
risks.mitigation: Use clamp() on all calculations, add unit tests

risks.risk: Position-aware traits may reduce available trait pool
risks.mitigation: Fall back to universal traits if position pool exhausted

files_to_modify.purpose: Fix attribute generation, add guards, align trait/badge logic

3_current_state_analysis.current_behavior: Attributes calculated as targetOvr ± random offset regardless of archetype tier. Points budget (primaryPoints, secondaryPoints, tertiaryPoints) calculated but unused.
3_current_state_analysis.desired_behavior: Primary attributes boosted +18-30 over base, secondary +10-20, tertiary +2-12. Archetypes produce meaningfully different stat profiles.

features.name: Fix Attribute Tier System
features.description: Remove unused points budget code. Apply tier-based boosts so primary attributes are significantly higher than secondary/tertiary.

features.name: Add Safety Guards
features.description: Add empty array guards to getRandomItem/weightedRandom. Add OVR range validation.

features.name: Position-Aware Traits
features.description: Filter trait pool by position so QBs don't get CB-specific traits.

features.name: Badge Split Implementation
features.description: Implement 70/30 position-specific vs universal badge split per comments.

features.name: Code Cleanup
features.description: Remove unused imports, fix Record type, use name rarity for selection.
